race: Any race with an Aberrant mark
specialties: An array of very powerful abilities
business: Uses its wealth to protect, train, and care for people who have aberrant marks
characteristics: Not actually a dragonmarked house, only uses the namesake 'House' to mock the other houses
Founded by a team of former Dark Lanterns assassins and spies with aberrant marks that were used in suicide missions.

The group eventually turned on the Dark Lanterns and fled to Sharn to form House Tarkanan - whose name is from Lord Halas Tarkanan, who fought the dragonmarked houses long ago and used his aberrant mark to destroy Sharn.
Will not assassinate high-ranking members of any criminal organization.
The leaders of the house are pragmatists and soldiers, and they train their recruits to be warriors and thieves.
Hate the dragonmarked houses for being prejudiced against their kind
